edge: The film 'Oppenheimer' won the prestigious award of Best Picture at the 96th Academy Awards, making it Nolan's most Oscar-nominated film with a total of 13 nominations.

Cillian Murphy won the award for Best Actor for his performance in 'Oppenheimer' at the 96th Academy Awards.
Robert Downey Jr. Won the award for Best Supporting Actor for his role in 'Oppenheimer' at the 96th Academy Awards.

Film editor Jennifer Lame received the award for Best Film Editing for her work on 'Oppenheimer' at the 96th Academy Awards.
Composer Hans Zimmer won the award for Best Original Score for his work on 'Oppenheimer' at the 96th Academy Awards.
Actress Angela Waterhorst was nominated for Best Supporting Actress for her role in 'Oppenheimer' at the 96th Academy Awards.
The movie Oppenheimer received nominations and won eight awards at the Critics' Choice Movie Awards ceremony, which honors excellence in cinematic achievement.
The movie Oppenheimer was nominated for and won seven awards at the British Academy Film Awards, which celebrate excellence in the art forms of film, games, and television.
The movie Oppenheimer won three awards at the Screen Actors Guild Awards, which honor outstanding performances by actors in film, television, and theatre.
